alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Merrick; Polk; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 8:40AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern York, northeastern Hamilton, central Merrick and southern Polk Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 840 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Clarks to near Marquette. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... York, Stromsburg, Osceola, Clarks, Polk, Waco, Benedict, Gresham, Hordville and Thayer. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 357 and 365. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
